name: Camping with Scary Teacher
description:
Scary Teacher is back and he takes you on a field trip for Camping.
Camping with him is just not a good idea!!
In this game you have to keep the fire alive for three minutes.

There is just one way to escape his anger you need to collect the wooden sticks and throw them into the fire.
You have limited time if the fire goes out, He will find you and punish you.
Scary Teacher is very strict,try to save yourself from his punishment
Are you lucky enough to escape from him???
